SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.locale

Interface PropertiesStorage

public interface PropertiesStorage
Groups Display Keys related collections.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    clearMessages()
    Clears errors and warnings.
    List<String>

    Loading errors.
    Map<Component,Map<String,Map<String,DisplayKeyValue>>>

    Returns a map of strings grouped by display key grouped by locale grouped by component
    Map<String,Map<String,DisplayKeyValue>>

  • Method Details

    • getPropertiesByLocaleByComponent

      Map<Component,Map<String,Map<String,DisplayKeyValue>>> getPropertiesByLocaleByComponent()
      Returns a map of strings grouped by display key grouped by locale grouped by component

    • getPropertiesByLocaleNoFallback

      Map<String,Map<String,DisplayKeyValue>> getPropertiesByLocaleNoFallback()
      The behavior of language fallback for display key lookup has changed to include the root display.properties file as a fallback for all locales. However we have a few tasks in the customer build like diffDisplayKeys, exportLocalizations, etc that still need to retain their previous behavior. It would make no sense for those tasks to rely on the fallback to the root display.properties file. This map is used to hold the properties of each locale without any fall back.

    • getWarnings

      List<String> getWarnings()
      Loading warnings.

    • getErrors

      List<String> getErrors()
      Loading errors.

    • isEmpty

      default boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if there are no properties.
      Returns:
      - true of empty, otherwise false.

    • clearMessages

      default void clearMessages()
      Clears errors and warnings.
